data.product_name: Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform
data.what_is:
With over 25+ years of experience and a global presence across Asia, Europe, and the USA, Netcore Cloud is an AI-powered platform designed to transform customer experience and personalization in the world of digital marketing. Its comprehensive suite of tools cater to various aspects of digital marketing, including omni-channel communication strategies, a customer data platform, personalization, and generative AI tools. This platform is tailored for marketers looking to elevate their brand's presence, foster deeper customer relationships, and drive substantial growth through personalized customer journeys.

With its robust analytics, Netcore Cloud helps brands understand their audience better, enabling targeted marketing campaigns that resonate with customers on a personal level. The platform's AI and machine learning capabilities ensure that each customer interaction is optimized for engagement and conversion, making every touchpoint an opportunity to impress and retain.

Serving over 6,500 brands across 40 countries, Netcore Cloud has proven its effectiveness in enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty, ultimately contributing to increased revenue and market share for businesses. Whether you're looking to refine your email marketing strategy, personalize your web experience, or engage customers across multiple channels seamlessly, Netcore Cloud offers the technology and expertise to achieve your goals.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to redefine your digital marketing strategy with Netcore Cloud. Learn more at https://netcorecloud.com/
data.product_description: Netcore Cloud is a globally recognized marketing technology SaaS company offering a full-stack of martech solutions that help product and growth marketers deliver AI-powered intelligent customer experiences across all touchpoints of the user's journey. Building a unified views of customers, orchestrating omnichannel communication journeys, personalizing the apps and websites, optimizing user experience, real-time reporting and providing actionable analytics, Netcore Cloud represents an all-in-one solution for a marketer.Netcore Cloud's Customer Engagement and Experience platform helps deliver omnichannel personalized experiences across multiple digital touch-points, including email, push notifications, SMS, WhatsApp, and web.Netcore Cloud enables you to unify all the customer data gathered from multiple channels and harness the power of AI to build human connections.The major challenges marketers face today are:--> Data Siloes--> Poor segmentation and targeting-  Lack of Personalization-  Broken customer experiencesNetcore Cloud's product suite addresses these challenges through a single platform and helps brands:--> Segment and orchestrate omnichannel behavior-driven campaigns--> Deliver AI-driven personalized experiences across the entire user journey--> Create no-code experiences that nudge users in the right direction--> Utilize eMail2.0 and the world's most advanced AI stackThe ability to do all of this using a single platform, is what makes 6500+ brands choose Netcore Cloud for driving seamless end-to-end customer journeys.

initial_reviews.review_title: Seamless Integration and Exceptional Support with Netcore's Automation Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
I'm having an excellent experience with Netcore and their automation platform. It works flawlessly, and the flow is always accurate. The integration has been seamless, and I have never encountered any technical errors. Special shoutout to Manish Khadye from the integration team--he is a rockstar! I always recommend others to choose him as their integration manager.

Moreover, the Customer Success Manager (CSM) team is incredibly helpful. They provide prompt responses and solutions to any issues or queries I have. As for the pricing, it is the best in the market, offering top-notch features. I highly recommend Netcore for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient automation platform.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
I would like to suggest that the Netcore team consider adding email templates and in-app templates to the platform. This would greatly ease the efforts of marketers and enhance the user experience.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Netcore is also helping me achieve the highest percentage of email sent rates, and their impactful personalization features have contributed significantly to our revenue growth. I highly recommend Netcore for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient automation platform

initial_reviews.review_title: Its good
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
I really appreciate how simple it is to send out marketing emails and create pop-ups for my homepage. Uploading my user contacts and segmenting them based on my campaign targets is very straightforward. I can track all my revenue and viewers, and analyze all the data from one platform, which is incredibly convenient. Additionally, the product manager is reliable, easy to communicate with, and very helpful and attentive. Overall, it's a platform that's easy to use on a daily basis.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
My main issue is that it's difficult to pull out a customer list based on user behavior, such as finding a segment of users who made purchases 6 to 12 months ago. I also find it frustrating that I need to regularly upload my user lists since the platform doesn't pull directly from our main database. Another drawback is that it can't do email dripping with the "send at best time" feature, which would improve my open rates. Drip email campaigns are crucial for me because I prefer not to send bulk emails to all my users at once.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Netcore's platform simplifies my email marketing operations, making the process much more efficient. It has significantly boosted my revenue, particularly through the pop-ups we've integrated on our homepage.

Drip email campaigns are crucial for me because I prefer not to send bulk emails to all my users at once.

initial_reviews.review_title: Netcore: A Powerful Tool for Personalizing Customer Journeys
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Netcore leverages AI and customer data to personalize communication across various channels. This can lead to more relevant and engaging experiences for customers, fostering stronger relationships. The platform allows you to reach customers through their preferred channels, like email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app messages. This ensures your message reaches them where they are, increasing the chances of engagement.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Steeper learniNetcore boasts a rich feature set, but this can also lead to a steeper learning curve. New users might find it challenging to navigate the platform and leverage its full potential.ng curve?

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problems Netcore Solves:

Customers interact with brands across various touchpoints (website, email, app). Netcore helps unify these interactions, providing a seamless and personalized experience. Netcore gathers customer data to understand their preferences and behavior. This allows for targeted communication and segmentation. Netcore provides a centralized platform to manage all customer engagement activities, streamlining workflows and saving time. Netcore personalizes messages and delivers them through preferred channels, increasing the chances of customer interaction.

Benefits for Businesses:

By providing a positive and personalized experience, Netcore helps build stronger customer relationships and loyalty. Targeted campaigns and data-driven insights lead to better conversions and a higher return on investment for marketing efforts. Effective customer engagement can drive sales and increase overall revenue for the business. Netcore streamlines marketing tasks and saves time by managing everything from one platform.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great CRM if you are on a Budget!
initial_reviews.review_content:

Well netcore started as Email Service Platform so they have really poineered that domain, then to offer full suite they started Smartech. The platform is great because you get Email, WhatsApp and SMS enabled. The CRM tool is great if you are on a budget or for small teams, amazing if you rely on email campaigns more.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
So they started from being ESP to now a CRM/CDP platform so they really need to catchup a lot with those competitors who were CRM/CDP first because they have tons of features which are not there. Netcore offers basic important features, but if you are hard-code, ultra level CRM marketer then you may want to pick up Clevertap, or WebEngage.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are numerous functionalities in SmarTech that I would like to emphasize. I particularly fond of its email campaign builder, which allows users to effortlessly create responsive mailers by simply dragging and dropping elements. This feature is truly impressive. Additionally, the platform offers the convenience of integrating SMS and email campaigns from a single interface. Moreover, the browser and app push notifications provided by SmarTech are worth exploring, as they can be managed from one centralized location. The reporting and analytics system is also commendable, providing a comprehensive view of campaign performance. In summary, I would highly recommend NetCore Smartech for its outstanding features.

all_reviews.review_title: Its good
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
I really appreciate how simple it is to send out marketing emails and create pop-ups for my homepage. Uploading my user contacts and segmenting them based on my campaign targets is very straightforward. I can track all my revenue and viewers, and analyze all the data from one platform, which is incredibly convenient. Additionally, the product manager is reliable, easy to communicate with, and very helpful and attentive. Overall, it's a platform that's easy to use on a daily basis.

all_reviews.review_title: From SPAM Struggles to Inbox Triumph: Netcore's Impactful Solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
We were grappling with an ongoing issue of SPAM emails negatively impacting our communication. However, Netcore stepped in and assisted us in enhancing our domain reputation, resulting in a significant enhancement in the delivery of emails directly to the inbox.

Netcore's comprehensive suite of analytics and reporting tools has empowered our business to effectively evaluate the impact of our campaigns. This, in turn, has granted us invaluable insights into customer behavior, enabling us to make well-informed decisions supported by concrete data.

The support team at Netcore has truly gone above and beyond. They've diligently addressed all of our inquiries and provided thorough explanations of their features. Their commitment extended to both online and offline meetings, where they guided us on how to extract maximum benefit from each feature.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Navigating the realm of marketing automation and website personalization has been an ongoing endeavor for us. While we've embarked on numerous journeys to enhance customer engagement, the desired impact has been a bit elusive. Despite creating a significant number of journeys, the conversion rates have not reached the level we aimed for.

One notable challenge we've encountered is the struggle to send emails to our complete database. This hurdle arises from our domain reputation exercise, a necessary step that unintentionally impacts our reach. It's been a learning experience as we balance the need for enhanced domain reputation with the desire to maximize our outreach.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were grappling with the persistent challenge of SPAM emails hampering our communication efforts. Enter Netcore, and their expertise in working on domain reputation emerged as a game-changer. With their effective strategies, our domain reputation saw a significant improvement, eradicating the SPAM obstacles that were hindering our outreach.

One of the pivotal milestones in this partnership was the activation of retention marketing through Netcore. This entailed the implementation of carefully curated customer journeys that breathed new life into our marketing efforts. The power of personalization and strategic touchpoints came to life through these journeys, allowing us to engage customers in ways we hadn't imagined before.

Communication became an art form with Netcore's multi-channel approach. Email, SMS, push notifications, and even WhatsApp were seamlessly integrated to create a holistic and impactful customer experience. This approach not only extended our reach but also fostered meaningful interactions that resonated with our audience.

Netcore's expertise, dedication, and innovative solutions have revitalized our marketing landscape. We're not only sending messages - we're forging connections and building relationships. Their role in solving our SPAM email issue and orchestrating our retention marketing efforts has been pivotal in our journey toward heightened customer engagement and satisfaction.

Analytics is sometimes not where you'd expect, and we need to create a segment to extract list.
Not having native API with some of our existing partners slowed down migration.

We can build out series of automated flow with great segmentation. Personalise our flows with shopping feed, and build campaigns quickly.
Our team run 24/7 social media and are benefiting from the automated connection with Meta to ensure our audiences are fresh, and we can retarget effectively, and timely.
The Netcore offering will allow us to improve our CRM and exend our CLV.

all_reviews.review_title: Nice tool & Does the Job
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
It's a proper marketing automation tool through which you can make segments and target your audience via different channels like sms, web push or browser push, as they (the platform) call it, email, WhatsApp etc. We used the platform in the early years of its launch in 2019 when it was called net core smartech.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
The support we got in the initial phase we used their pepipost email was tremendous. But later, when they switched us to their customer engagement panel, erstwhile smart tech the support they offered was not satisfactory. We used it only for web integration, so we can't say much about its app integration and its pro or cons.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used to send emails via netcore customer engagement platform, and it had a decent interface to send emails easily to a segmented audience. It has an email suppression/blacklist option to add unsubscribed users easily from our previous email service provider on this panel. Such users won't receive any email even if they exist on the mailing list. They have no restriction or limit on the number of users we can upload on their platform. Thus we added our complete database of more than 15L users without hassle.

all_reviews.review_title: My Netcore Experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
With netcore our marketing automation process and enhanced a lot. We can now do AB testing on our mailers, see the relevant data and how our customers are reacting to our mails. This is very useful as we can now design the exact specific mails and creatives and subject lines which are doing well. Without netcore this process would have been an inefficient process

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Nothing for now, the experience with netcore for the short period of time has been seamless. We haven't experienced any such problems yet. If any issue does come up we will let the team netcore know about it

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The analysis the netcore platform provides is superb. The real stats are very useful for us to see and analyse as to what we can do better with our content and creative. User information available is also immense help like
Click data where we can see where the customer has clicked on the mailer. Using this we design our mailers accordingly

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform for omni channel engagement.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
I have top 3 on this subject
The omni-channel engagement is excellent, able to deliver message cross channel (email, sms, whatsapp, and also website) as per our needs in Consumer Good industry.
Integration with other system also excellent. User friendly tools, even the one that not experience can use it directly.
Netcore team also very helpful to solve issue.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Not totally dislike, but opportunity to make the system more reliable and fit for future needs on the limitation on updating audience on the journey. If possible to add audience in the middle of the journey will be very great.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Consumer engagement in multi platform to be able to reach consumer in the channel where consumer more active whether in personal communication (SMS, Whatsapp, Email) or in Website, or even in digital ads channel with targeted way. Hence the impact, we can reduce investment waste (reduce overlapping) and improve our consumer engagement rate that impacting to our consumer retention.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
The platform can be buggy. There are many glitches and bugs that need ironing out. Moreover, the HTML editor is broken. It skips lines of code upon clicing. It can be really inconvenient and annoying when editing templates.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent integration support. Event better tool performance
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Support from the Netcore team for smooth transition helped us to transition within a week. The granularity of user journies is genuinely remarkable. The funnel lets us optimize every detail of the email, from the subject to the location of CTAs.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
The current dashboard is not very rich and flexible. CSV download to perform even some of the most basic analyses becomes a tedious process.

Recommendations to others considering Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform:
This tool is ideal for running e-mail operations of e-commerce companies. The automated report genertion tool will help your team to monitor the health of the account with ease. This tool is a dream for running targeted email campaigns smoothly. Data visualizations are not top-notch. I would reccomend users to just download the reports and intrepret with Excel or Power BI.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We manage automated emails for the entire order flow. We also manage coupon disbursal, reminders and nudges using the tool. We deploy and monitor large scale campaings with this tool.

all_reviews.review_title: Our experience with Netcore
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
- can create general segments to be used in sending out major announcements
- can automate campaigns via journeys
- can set goal of email campaign (ex. conversions via item count)

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
- cannot personalize SMS.
- no facility for whitelisting of promo codes
- certain limitations with sending email campaigns (ex. cannot create box with vertical borders, no feature to insert table)
- cannot preview email & SMS messages before sendout/scheduling
- had SMS sendout where links inserted became https://www.xxxxx.com
- Email report not downloadable in billing section. have to download it by filtering in the campaigns section.
- campaigns reports could show campaign takers, control group, ROI, LIFT

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Netcore is able to help us automate some campaigns, reducing our need to send them manually. This is the case for our educational journey for new users when they sign-up.

all_reviews.review_title: Good solution for bulk email and sms services
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform helped with:
We are using netcore services for pushing bulk sms and services to our customers on regular basis and across all business units with communication more than 5 million customers . Services are used by business for updating account related information to customers, sending otps and marketing team for marketing related information on regular basis and most of the work is automated. We have integrated our applications with their systems and also use panel to push the emails and sms

What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
User friendly dashboard. Easy to integrate with inhouse developed applications. Scalable solution. Requirements can be customized based on business need. Technical support is good. Multiple panel options are available. The maintain good database of customer information.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Many times marketing emails go to junk or spam folder when triggered from their platform. Sometime lot of Delay in OTPs on sms and email and this is frequent issue. Also pricing they have increased in last few years . Lot of dmarc failures and no action is taken. Security controls implemented on their setup may be of concern specially securing pii data.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deliver on time OTPs to customers when applying or buying for any services or products from organizations websites or apps. Increase brand reputation and revenue from marketing emails. Ensure required communication is done to all customers on various updates regarding the products or services which they have purchased or account related information.
It is good platform to reach multiple customers at the same time

all_reviews.review_content:

Smartech is used by marketers and is an email integration tool. It saved us a lot of money and within just few days of using you can see the advantages instantly. It does segmentation and personalization for campaigns. It is quite simple to use and reporting and analytics are my favorite features. It gets integrated to SMS and email and contains notifications that keep you updated. The price is also affordable and helped us save money. It is the best one I have seen for doing campaigns. The customer support is never absent even for a single day they provide helpful solutions 365 days. It provides great automation and it also allows us to track the customers. It improved our work so I will continue using it in the future.

The UI of Smartech is lacking and needs improvement. The customer support is slow in working and difficult to get hold of which can be frustrating if you have a problem that needs to be solved immediately. The drag and drop need to be more user friendly and the automation workflow needs improvement. Website Optimizer and DMP integration are the things that I least like about it. I hope in the future they produce more detailed reports.

Smartech made our work efficient for better. I think it is safe to say that it is the best marketing tool in the industry so I recommend this to everyone.

all_reviews.review_title: Tool review of Smartech
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
User friendly panel. Customer support. Tool is taking less time as compared to other similar tools for execution.

What do you dislike about Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform?
Over all experience is good but still there is scope for improvement. Netcore can implement sender domain health tab in the UI. Best performing and lower performing camapigns need to be highlighted on dashboard. Customer need to receive confirmation with statistics on mail within hour of execution.

What problems is Netcore Customer Engagement and Experience Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
API solution is good. Link tracking feature is good. Reporting dashboard can be improved more for SMS but over all current reporting structure is good.
